extendedInfo.description: *** This app is a free trial limited to 10 translations ***Translating Keyboard is the only way to translate what you type to any other language, IN ANY APP.Do you need to send or receive messages in another language? Are you tired of switching back and forth between your favorite app and a translator app? With Translating Keyboard you just type, translate and send. It works inside any app because it replaces the default keyboard with a powerful, full-featured keyboard that has a built-in translator. Use Translating Keyboard to send messages in SMS, email, Skype, Facebook, ...anywhere!Translating Keyboard can even translate messages you receive in another language, to your language. If the app can cut or copy text, Translating Keyboard can translate the message.Translating Keyboard is also a powerful replacement keyboard that you will love using even when you don't need to translate. All letters, numbers and punctuation are available on the main keyboard without switching to the symbol keyboard. Accented letters for Spanish, French, German and many other languages are included. English spelling-correction and text prediction make typing fast and easy.Translating Keyboard is powered by Google Translate, the world's most powerful translation engine, capable of translating between 53 different languages.----------*Translating Keyboard is a free download but there is a small fee of $1 per 200 translations because the Google Translate API is no longer free for apps. There are no other fees to use Translating Keyboard.

reviews.title: Ripoff
reviews.comment: Used the demo liked it so I bought the upgrade since then I cannot use the app. Everytime I try to translate I\'m told to update then I update and go through the same cycle over and over again. Sent the makers 4 emails and keep getting the same reply for 2 weeks now. \" Your request is being reviewed\" but nothing has been done. Big ripoff and others have had the same problem. Uninstall.
reviews.author: John Kinneen

reviews.title: Upgrade issues
reviews.comment: The app worked fine during the trial but when I paid for the upgrade it never upgraded. I try and use it now and the upgrade screen pops up and I can\'t use it. I contacted customer service by email and never got a response. I will look else where for a translator keyboard app.
reviews.author: Shane Arthurs

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: I used this good and I wanted to upgrade this but I read comments here that after updating it\'s not working so I will not gonna buy this.

reviews.comment: Does not fulfill it\'s expectations. Does not translate very well still leaves simple words the same, that there is a translation in Spanish. I bought the full pro translation and now it does translate in any language. I am asking for full refund of \302\2432.95 or help, this is my second time requesting help. I will let everyone know if I do get the help. Thanks\tGreat, need more like dictionary like for proper spelling English and Spanish.  Please.  Thank you
